item.title: How to use Auto Cache Downloader for your RSPS!
item.dc:creator: @dreamedsoul dreamedsoul
item.description:
@dreamedsoul wrote:

keep getting this error.

client.java:4918: error: constructor Update in class Update cannot be applied to given types; new Update("https://dl.dropbox.com/s/zdi4gheo1fok91h/PerfectionZCach e.zip"); ^ required: String,String,String found: String reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: How to use Auto Cache Downloader for your RSPS!
item.dc:creator: @LuminateGifted LuminateGifted
item.description:
@LuminateGifted wrote:

Hi sorry if this is an old thread and a bump but I get this error

you're a faggot riley317 java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\CacheDynasty\main_file_cache.dat (The system ca nnot find the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:241) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:122) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:55) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744) java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\CacheDynasty\main_file_cache.dat (The system ca nnot find the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:241) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:122) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:55) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\CacheDynasty\rileycache.zip (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:221) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:110) at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:125) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:99) at client.startUp(client.java:7219) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4688) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744) The cache was not downloaded correctly. Please download it manually at: C:/CacheDynastyrileycache.zip File Directory: C:/CacheDynasty
help please

Read full topic

item.title: How to use Auto Cache Downloader for your RSPS!
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“CrookedX, post:45, topic:415214”]Rev Limit is loading…
java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53)
at Update.(Update.java:29)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4879)
at client.startUp(client.java:9176)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:6186)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

i get this when i run my client any idea’s?[/quote]

Are you sure when you open the zip file, there’s not another file rather than your cache files? And you sure its not .rar, should be .zip

drawLoadingText(0, “Connecting to File Server…”);

Under that it should say something around the lines of A url… replace

Code: [Select]
new Update("RandomCAche or w/e.zip

With the URL of your Dropbox cache so it might look like something near this

their is nothing like that in this step for my cache… any other options for it?

item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“pwnsrd, post:40, topic:415214”].\Javafiles\SpriteDownloader.java:40: error: cannot find symbol public CacheDownloader downloadCache() { ^ symbol: class CacheDownloader location: class SpriteDownloader .\Javafiles\client.java:8265: error: cannot find symbol new CacheDownloader(this).downloadCache(); ^ symbol: class CacheDownloader location: class client Note: .\Javafiles\client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

i Get this when i compile

[quote]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Cache123\Cache123.zip?dl=1 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at client.downloadcache(client.java:4890)
at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4707)
at client.startUp(client.java:9792)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:99)
at client.run(client.java:6409)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/quote]

i get this as an error please help :/[/quote]

Try deleting it
